prompts: Create a cute fire-type Pokemon that has a flame on its back and a small stature.
Imagine a small Pokemon with a blue-green head and a fiery orange tail.
Show me a Pokemon that resembles a tiny creature with a playful personality and bright colors.
Generate a design for a starter Pokemon that embodies warmth and coziness, perfect for beginners.
Make a character concept for a fire-type Pokemon that loves to explore forested areas.
Design a Pokemon that has a distinctive rounded body and is primarily orange with a fiery accent.
Give me an idea for a Pokemon that evolves from a small creature to a more powerful fire-type.
